content: k1 center st yo ssk k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times * yo k1 2 times yo ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times repeat from * to last 4 sts k1 yo k3 row 16 k3 yo p to last 3 sts ending with yo k3 chart 1 written instructions chart 3 written instructions row 1 rs k3 edge sts yo k1 * k1 yo 3 row 1 k3 edge sts yo k across to center st times ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 2 times yo k1 center st yo k across to last 3 sts yo yo repeat from * to 1 st before center st k1 yo k1 k3 edge sts center st yo k1 * yo k1 2 times yo ssk ssk row 2 and all even row k3 yo p to last 3 cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times repeat from * to sts ending with yo k3 last 4 sts k1 yo k3 edge sts row 3 k3 yo k3 k2tog yo * k1 yo 3 times row 2 k3 yo p to last 3 sts ending with yo k3 ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 2 times yo http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com 3 times ssk ssk k1 k2tog k1 yo k1 center st bind off yo k1 ssk k1 k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times * yo using us size 8 5 0mm needle loosely bind off k1 2 times yo ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 as follows 3 times repeat from * to last 8 sts yo ssk k3 yo knit 1 stitch knit 1 stitch slip left hand needle k3 through the front loops of the 2 previously knit row 5 k3 yo k across to center st yo k1 center stitches on right hand needle and knit two st yo k across to last 3 sts yo k3 together through back loops *knit 1 stitch slip row 7 k3 yo k1 ssk k2tog k2tog yo k1 2 left hand needle through the front loops of the 2 times yo * k1 yo 3 times ssk ssk cdd k2tog stitches on right hand needle and knit two k2tog yo k1 2 times yo repeat from * to 13 sts together through back loops repeat from * until before center st k1 yo 3 times ssk ssk k1 all stitches have been bound off k2tog k2tog yo k1 yo k1 center st yo k1 yo ssk ssk k1 k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times * yo k1 finishing 2 times yo ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 weave in all loose threads wash and block times repeat from * to last 12 sts yo k1 2 times enjoy yo ssk ssk k2tog k1 yo k3 row 9 k3 yo
